data.name: A Little To The Left Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
